description:
There is a need to create a new report on MIFOS X that will show all CLOSED LOANS. Prior to running the Report, the following parameters needs to be supplied

Office
From Date and To Date
Loan Officer
Loan Product
The report should list the following data;

Loan Account No
Name of Client
Disbursed Loan (Principal)
Expected Interest
Expected Fees
Paid Interest
Paid Fees
Written Off
The report footer should give a Total of the above Fields
name: Report For Mifos X Closed Loans
